user.title: Neviweb130: Sinope zigbee and wifi devices control
user.description: Enter data for connection to Neviweb, login (email), password, location one two and three as network, network2 and network3, Scan_interval, Homekit support, stat_interval and Notifications.

data.scan_interval: Optional, Neviweb polling interval, 300 to 600 sec.
data.stat_interval: Optional, Devices energy statistic polling interval, 300 to 1800 sec.
data.notify: Optional, get notification in case of device error.

reconfigure.title: Neviweb130: reconfigure options
reconfigure.description: Enter data for connection to Neviweb, login (email), password, location one two and three as network, network2 and network3, Scan_interval, Homekit support, stat_interval and Notifications.

data.network: Optional, First neviweb location name, or ' '.
data.network2: Optional, Second neviweb location name, or ' '.
data.network3: Optional, Third Neviweb Location name, or ' '.
data.scan_interval: Optional, Neviweb polling interval, 300 to 600 sec.
data.stat_interval: Optional, Devices energy statistic polling interval, 300 to 1800 sec.
data.notify: Optional, get notification in case of device error.

error.bad_network_name: Network name can't contain accented characters
error.Cannot_Connect: Test connection to neviweb fail, check user and password
